name: shul
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
another word for a synagogue (= a building in which Jewish people worship and study their religion), used by some Jewish people: In the synagogue, or shul, everything was marked according to the festivals. The tradition is to fast and stay in shul all day on Yom Kippur.
More examplesFewer examplesThe service in shul was followed by a sit-down lunch.The high ceiling of the empty Shul created a sort of heavenly echo.He runs "Shul in the Park", a more relaxed informal synagogue service.
